problem with my Limelight 3G. I don’t know how similar the process is for the Limelight 3, but I learned that if I \u003cstrong\u003epressed the red button on my Limelight 3G while plugging it into the computer, then keeping it pressed for about 15 seconds\u003c/strong\u003e, the lights would never become bright, and it would be recognized as a drive by my computer and by balenaEtcher. See if this works for you.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eI learned about this by going to \u003ca href=\"https://docs.limelightvision.io/docs/docs-limelight/getting-started/FRC/imaging\" rel=\"noopener nofollow ugc\"\u003ethis page\u003c/a\u003e.
